meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To allow the Deputy Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration on the date of enactment of this Act to continue to serve as such Deputy Administrator.

main.name: S2249

content.p: To allow the Deputy Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration on the date of enactment of this Act to continue to serve as such Deputy Administrator.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Authority for continuation of service of the Deputy Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration.

subsection.heading: In general.—
subsection.content: An individual serving as Deputy Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration on the date of enactment of this Act may continue to serve as such Deputy Administrator, without regard to the restrictions specified in the 5th sentence of section 106(d)(1) of title 49, United States Code.

subsection.heading: Rule of construction.—
subsection.content: Nothing in this Act shall be construed as approval by Congress of any future appointments of military persons to the Offices of Administrator and Deputy Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
